Source.Name: logisim
Source.Summary: An educational tool for designing and simulating digital logic circuits

Update.Comment: * Version bump - When drawing diagonally while adding wires, an "L" shape is formed, so two wires are added instead of just one. - When zooming far out, the grid becomes dense and very dark. - On some platforms, the canvas would gray out when a component was selected for addition, and it would not clear except for the component's location until the component was inserted. - In zooming in or out, the scroll bars were not recomputed based on the new zoom distance. - In zooming in or out, the location within the canvas would be lost. - A new package (com.cburch.logisim.instance) provides an API that dramatically simplifies the development of JAR libraries. The built-in Arithmetic, Plexers, Memory, and I/O libraries have been refactored to use it. - Added the capacity to export PNG and JPEG files in addition to GIFs. The menu option Export As GIF... is renamed to Export Image - When a circuit is removed from the project while a tool for adding subcircuits is selected, a different tool is selected. - Removed unneeded patch. (macos.patch)
Update.Name: Cihan Okyay
